1 #! /usr/bin/env python3
2 
3 from __future__ import print_function
4 import rospy
5 from uarm_msgs.srv import *
6 from std_srvs.srv import *
7 from uarm_msgs.msg import *
8 from std_msgs.msg import Float64
9 from std_msgs.msg import MultiArrayDimension
10 from sensor_msgs.msg import JointState
11 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
12 import actionlib
13 from sensor_msgs.msg import JointState
14 import time
15 import numpy as np
16 
17 class uArm_sim_Server():
18 
19  def __init__(self, ns="", part=""):
20  self.ns = ns
21  self.part = part
22  self.pub1 = rospy.Publisher(str(self.ns+'joint1/command'), Float64, queue_size=1)
23  self.pub2 = rospy.Publisher(str(self.ns+'joint2/command'), Float64, queue_size=1)
24  self.pub3 = rospy.Publisher(str(self.ns+'joint3/command'), Float64, queue_size=1)
25  self.pub8 = rospy.Publisher(str(self.ns+'joint8/command'), Float64, queue_size=1)
26  self.pubtcp = rospy.Publisher(str(self.ns+'jointtcp/command'), Float64, queue_size=1)
27  self.lis = rospy.Subscriber(str(self.ns+"joint_states"), JointState, self.callback)
28  self.lisp = rospy.Subscriber(str(self.ns+"pump_grasping"), Bool, self.pump_lis)
29  self.pub_pos = rospy.Publisher(str(ns+part+"position"), uarm_state, queue_size=1)
30  self.pub_busy = rospy.Publisher(str(ns+part+"busy"), Bool, queue_size=1)
31  self.busy = False
32  self.joints = [0]*5
33  self.joint_state = [0]*5
34  self.joint_state_pos = [-1]*5
35  self.joint_names = ['Joint1','Joint2','Joint3','Joint8','JointTCP']
36  self.pos_x = 0
37  self.pos_y = 0
38  self.pos_z = 0
39  self.pos_w = 0
40  self.target_x = 0
41  self.target_y = 0
42  self.target_z = 0
43  self.target_w = 0
44 
45  self.pump_state = False
46 
47  #lengths and angles
48  self.l1 = 0.0132*1000 #delta x - joint1 to joint2
49  self.l2 = 0.14207*1000 #delta z - joint2 to joint3
50  self.l3 = 0.15852*1000 #delta x - joint3 to joint8
51  self.l4 = 0.0545*1000 #delta x - joint8 to pump nozzle
52  self.l5 = 0.1056*1000 #delta z joint 2 to ground
53  self.l6 = 0.0745*1000 #delta z - joint8 to pump nozzle
54 
55  rospy.loginfo('%s: started' % (str(self.ns+'interface')))
56 
57  def get_joint_state_pos(self, label):
58  i = 0
59  k = 0
60  for j in self.joint_names:
61  while self.joint_state_pos[k] < 0 and i < 1000:
62  if label[i] == j:
63  self.joint_state_pos[k] = i
64  else:
65  i = i+1
66  if i == 1000:
67  print("didnt find Joint")
68  k = k+1
69 
70  def pub_cart(self,theta,alpha,beta,epsilon):
71  r = self.l1+self.l2*np.sin(alpha)+self.l3*np.cos(alpha+beta)+self.l4
72  self.point = uarm_state()
73  self.point.x = int(np.around(r*np.cos(theta)))
74  self.point.y = int(np.around(r*np.sin(theta)))
75  self.point.z = int(np.around(self.l5+self.l2*np.cos(alpha)-self.l3*np.sin(alpha+beta)-self.l6))
76  self.point.w = int(epsilon/3.14159*180)
77  self.point.pump = self.pump_state
78  if self.busy:
79  self.ready = False
80  else:
81  self.ready = True
82  self.pos_x = self.point.x
83  self.pos_y = self.point.y
84  self.pos_z = self.point.z
85  self.pos_w = self.point.w
86  self.pub_pos.publish(self.point)
87 
88  def callback(self, data):
89  if self.joint_state_pos[0] < 0:
90  self.get_joint_state_pos(data.name)
91  i = 0
92  while i < len(self.joint_state):
93  self.joint_state[i] = data.position[self.joint_state_pos[i]]
94  i=i+1
95  self.check_position(self.target_x, self.target_y, self.target_z, self.target_w)
96  self.pub_cart(self.joint_state[0], self.joint_state[1], self.joint_state[2],self.joint_state[4])
97  self.pub_busy.publish(self.busy)
98  self.pub_joints(self.joints)
99 
100  def pump_lis(self, data):
101  self.pump_state = data.data
102 
103 
104  def calc_joints(self, x, y, z, w):
105 
106  #angles
107  theta = 0 #joint1 angle (rot z axis)
108  alpha = 0 #joint2 angle (rot y axis)
109  beta = 0 #joint3 angle (rot y axis)
110  gamma = 0 #joint8 angle (rot y axis)
111  delta = 0 #angle at joint 2 of the links triangle
112  sigma = 0 #angle between c and x-y plane
113  epsilon = 0 #tcp angle
114 
115  #calculate lengths of the triangle of the links
116 
117  r = (x**2+y**2)**0.5
118  a = self.l2
119  b = self.l3
120  c = ((r-self.l1-self.l4)**2+(z+self.l6-self.l5)**2)**0.5
121 
122  #calculate angles
123  if y == 0:
124  theta = 0
125  else:
126  theta = np.arcsin(y/r)
127  delta= np.arccos(-(b**2-a**2-c**2)/(2*a*c))
128  beta = np.pi/2-np.arccos(-(c**2-a**2-b**2)/(2*a*b))
129  sigma = np.arcsin((z+self.l6-self.l5)/c)
130  alpha = np.pi/2-delta-sigma
131  gamma = -beta-alpha
132  epsilon = w/180*3.14159
133 
134  self.joints = [theta, alpha, beta, gamma, epsilon]
135  return self.joints
136 
137  def check_position(self, x, y, z, w):
138  if x+2 >= self.pos_x and x-2 <= self.pos_x and y-2 <= self.pos_y and y+2 >= self.pos_y and z-4 <= self.pos_z and z+2 >= self.pos_z and w-2 <= self.pos_w and w+2 >= self.pos_w:
139  self.busy = False
140  return True
141  else:
142  self.busy = True
143  return False
144 
145  def pub_joints(self, joints):
146  self.pub1.publish(joints[0])
147  self.pub2.publish(joints[1])
148  self.pub3.publish(joints[2])
149  self.pub8.publish(-self.joint_state[2]-self.joint_state[1])
150  self.pubtcp.publish(joints[4])
151  def check_limits(self,x,y,z,w):
152  lim_x = [30,280]
153  lim_y = [-278,278]
154  lim_z = [-120, 130]
155  lim_w = [0,180]
156  lim_r = [150,280]
157  limits = [lim_x,lim_y,lim_z,lim_w,lim_r]
158  r = (x**2+y**2)**0.5
159  coordinates = [x,y,z,w,r]
160  for i in [0,1,2,3,4]:
161  if coordinates[i] < limits[i][0] or coordinates[i] > limits[i][1]:
162  rospy.loginfo('%s: target position out of range [%i, %i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.ns+self.part), x, y, z, w))
163  return False
164  return True
165 
166  def move(self, x, y, z, w=90):
167  rospy.loginfo('%s: new goal received [%i, %i, %i, %i]' % (str(self.ns+self.part), x, y, z, w))
168 
169  if not self.check_limits(x, y, z, w):
170  return False
171  self.joints = self.calc_joints(x, y, z, w)
172 
173  self.target_x = x
174  self.target_y = y
175  self.target_z = z
176  self.target_w = w
177  self.busy = True
178  self.pub_joints(self.joints)
179  return True
180 
181  def stop(self):
182  if not self.move(self.pos_x, self.pos_y, self.pos_z, self.pos_w):
183  x = self.pos_x
184  y = self.pos_y
185  z = self.pos_z
186  w = self.pos_w
187  if self.pos_x < 30:
188  x = 30
189  if self.pos_x > 280:
190  x = 280
191  if self.pos_y < -278:
192  y = -278
193  if self.pos_y > 278:
194  y = 278
195  if self.pos_z < 0:
196  z = 0
197  if self.pos_z > 130:
198  z = 130
199  if (x**2+y**2)**0.5 < 150 or(x**2+y**2)**0.5 > 280:
200  x=180
201  y=0
202  z=130
203  if self.pos_w < 0:
204  w = 0
205  if self.pos_w > 180:
206  w = 180
207  self.move(x,y,z,w)
208 
209  #print("stopped uarm")
210  return True
211 
212  def set_pump(self, data):
213  if data:
214  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.ns+'/on'), Empty)
215  received_response = service_object()
216  rospy.loginfo('%s: pump activated' % (str(self.ns+self.part)))
217  else:
218  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.ns+'/off'), Empty)
219  received_response = service_object()
220  rospy.loginfo('%s: pump deactivated' % (str(self.ns+self.part)))
221 
222 if __name__ == '__main__':
223  rospy.init_node('uarm_gazebo_interface_node')
224  server = uArm_sim_Server(rospy.get_name())
225  rospy.spin()
